CustomField.formula: IF(( Age_in_days__c > 7), '7+ days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 6 && Age_in_days__c <= 7 ),'6-7 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 5 && Age_in_days__c <= 6 ),'5-6 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 4 && Age_in_days__c <= 5 ),'4-5 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 3 && Age_in_days__c <= 4 ),'3-4 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 2 && Age_in_days__c <= 3 ),'2-3 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 1 && Age_in_days__c <= 2 ),'1-2 Days', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 0.5 && Age_in_days__c <= 1 ),'12-24 Hours', IF(( Age_in_days__c > 0.25 && Age_in_days__c <= 0.5 ),'6-12 Hours', IF(( Age_in_days__c <= 0.25),'0-6 hours','None' ))))))))) )
CustomField.label: LOCA Age Buckets
